typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code as string,
		continent as string,
		population as string,
		indicator as string,
		daily_count as string,
		date as string,
		rate_14_day as string,
		source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> casesdeathssource
casesdeathssource filter(continent=="Europe" && not(isNull(country_code))) ~> FlterEurope
FlterEurope select(mapColumn(
		country,
		country_code,
		population,
		indicator,
		daily_count,
		source,
		each(match(name=="date"),
			"reported"+"_date" = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectRequiredFeilds
SelectRequiredFeilds pivot(columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true) ~> Pivot1
